algorithm_technique: Sort x-coordinates and find max difference between adjacent elements.
problem_summary_simple: Find the widest vertical strip between points that doesn't contain any other points.
problem_summary_technical: Sort unique x-coordinates and compute the maximum difference between consecutive sorted x-values.
key_insights: The y-coordinates are irrelevant for determining the width of vertical areas.
Sorting the x-coordinates allows for a simple linear scan to find the maximum gap.
Using a set to store x-coordinates automatically handles duplicates.
